title: WTB -- graded T206 Foster (SLer) - Paying $50 above VCP!
author: Adam

posts.post_title: WTB -- graded T206 Foster (SLer) - Paying $50 above VCP!
posts.post_content:
Paying $50 above VCP pricing for any graded T206 Ed Foster with good eye appeal.  Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you have one you'd sell me!

Regards,
Adam
Hi Adam Heritage has a PSA 4 in their weekly auction ending Sept 13. Good Luck Daryl
Thanks Daryl -- I'm hoping I could just pass my money to some good Net 54 folks though!

Have a SGC 30 Old Mill that looks great and some cash if you have a Cy "bare hand showing" to trade......

LMK, Bob

Adam:

Did you ever get one of these?  I have a PSA 2 that's in pretty decent shape.  If you''re still shopping, I'll attach a scan to your email.

Hi Bob -- Please do send a front scan to me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] and I will get back to you asap, as I indeed am still buying!

Best regards,
Adam
